name: Suspicious Tasklist Discovery Command
description: Adversaries may attempt to get information about running processes on a system. Information obtained could be used to gain an understanding of common software/applications running on systems within the network
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*tasklist* OR process.executable:*\\tasklist.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:tasklist.exe)`
